name: Big Jill Runs Around V1
description:
The quit button doesn't work 😅😅 But that's because it's running in a browser so if you want it to work then your gonna have to crash your browser... 😅😅😅

Oh and the surprise doesn't work that well either 😅😅😅 because its in a browser???? 😅😅 If you want the surprise to download the game (free obviously) from the link below.

If you want the PC version (windows only, if you can be bothered to - wine i guess) here is the link [LINK DUH]

Keybinds:

M = Menu,

R = Restart (go back to first level),

Q = Reset player rotation,

T = Surprise,
